### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE sports_venues (
  venue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  venue_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  amenities TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE sports_venues SET capacity=100 WHERE venue_id=1;
